attributes.action: Allow vape shops to open during lock downs class them as “essential”
attributes.additional_details:
We the people ask our government to help us and class vape shops as “essential” 

So they can once again help people stop smoking and maintain the progress they have made getting the uk smoke free 

Let’s keep up the excellent progress they have made as an industry and collectively with PHE & NHS and government 

Lets NOT start back at square one ACT NOW

Why undo all the good work over many years the industry has done 

Italy have supported this and understand the benefits to the population
attributes.background:
PHE & NHS support vaping industry,they have made this clear around the world, 

Closing vape stores is driving people back to smoking putting more stress on the NHS dealing with smoking related Illnesses , 
Vaping saves lives, do not undo all the hard work helping people stop smoking

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307865

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
